permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

params.name: visitorId
params.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
whose messages will be retrieved.

params.name: viewAs
params.doc:
Controls which message data is returned
based on message and badge visibility.

- `VISITOR`: Messages are returned where `visibility` is `EVERYONE`. In those messages, only badges where `badgeVisibility` is `EVERYONE` are returned.
- `BUSINESS`: All messages and badges are returned.

For 3rd-party apps, defaults to `VISITOR`.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc:
The number of items to load.
 Cursor token returned in the query response. To be used on the next query request, but not the first query request.

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

params.name: order
params.doc:
Sort order. Messages are sorted by the `sequence` property.

 - `ASC`: Messages are sorted from earliest to most recent.
 - `DESC`: Messages are sorted from most recent to earliest.

 Defaults to `DESC`.

docs.summary:
Retrieves messages between the site and the specified visitor, contact, or member.

Up to 30 messages are returned per request.
If the total number of messages is larger than the page size,
the `nextCursor` parameter is returned in the response,
indicating that another page of results is available.
To retrieve the next page,
pass the returned `nextCursor` value
in the next request's `paging.cursor` query parameter.

`nextCursor` is omitted in the last page of results.

By default, 30 messages are retrieved,
sorted by `sequence` in descending order
(the most recent messages are first in the list).

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

params.name: visitorId
params.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
whose messages will be retrieved.

params.name: viewAs
params.doc:
Controls which message data is returned
based on message and badge visibility.

- `VISITOR`: Messages are returned where `visibility` is `EVERYONE`. In those messages, only badges where `badgeVisibility` is `EVERYONE` are returned.
- `BUSINESS`: All messages and badges are returned.

For 3rd-party apps, defaults to `VISITOR`.

params.name: paging.limit
params.doc:
The number of items to load.
 Cursor token returned in the query response. To be used on the next query request, but not the first query request.

params.name: paging.cursor
params.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

params.name: order
params.doc:
Sort order. Messages are sorted by the `sequence` property.

 - `ASC`: Messages are sorted from earliest to most recent.
 - `DESC`: Messages are sorted from most recent to earliest.

 Defaults to `DESC`.

docs.summary:
Retrieves messages between the site and the specified visitor, contact, or member.

Up to 30 messages are returned per request.
If the total number of messages is larger than the page size,
the `nextCursor` parameter is returned in the response,
indicating that another page of results is available.
To retrieve the next page,
pass the returned `nextCursor` value
in the next request's `paging.cursor` query parameter.

`nextCursor` is omitted in the last page of results.

By default, 30 messages are retrieved,
sorted by `sequence` in descending order
(the most recent messages are first in the list).

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

params.name: visitor.id
params.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending or receiving the message.

params.name: visitor
params.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending or receiving the message.

params.name: message
params.doc: Message to send.

params.name: direction
params.doc:
Whether the message is being sent from the visitor or the business.

 - `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`:
   Message is displayed in Inbox and the chat widget as if the visitor sent it.
   Triggers the [Message Sent To Visitor Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/message-sent-to-visitor-webhook).
 - `VISITOR_TO_BUSINESS`:
   Message is displayed in Inbox and the chat widget as if the business sent it.
   Triggers the [Message Sent To Business Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/message-sent-to-business-webhook).

 Defaults to `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`.

params.name: notificationChannels
params.doc: Whether this message should trigger notifications or not

docs.summary: Sends a message to the business or a visitor, contact, or member.

examples.title: Send Message Text
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"PLAIN","plain":{"type":"TEXT","data":[{"text":"Hi! How are you doing?"}]}},"badges":[{"text":"my badge","visibility":"PRIVILEGED","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg"}]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Template
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"TEMPLATE","summary":"New Store Order","template":{"title":"New Store Order","textLines":["Red shoes - $10"],"buttons":[{"label":"View Order","url":"link-to-order"}],"orientation":"PORTRAIT","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg"}},"badges":[]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Minimal
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"MINIMAL","summary":"Incoming call","minimal":{"text":"Incoming call to your business line","image":"https:\/\/wix.com\/an-image.jpg","url":"https:\/\/wix.com\/a-link"}},"badges":[]}}'

examples.title: Send Message Form
body:
curl -X POST \
    'https://www.wixapis.com/inbox/v1/615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d/messages' \
    -H 'Authorization: <AUTH>' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"visitor":{"id":"615eaba9-1bf5-4c21-9107-713003e4e37d"},"message":{"payload":{"type":"FORM","summary":"hello world!","form":{"title":"Quote Submission","description":"Visitor #1234 requested a quote!","fields":[{"name":"description","value":"Landing page"},{"name":"budget","value":"$1,000"}],"media":[{"image":{"id":"d881c5_9bacdb073944412283e509e9053bc096~mv2.jpg","fileName":"IMG_1717.JPG","width":200,"height":200,"mimeType":"uri\/image","url":"https:\/\/static.wixstatic.com\/media\/d881c5_9bacdb073944412283e509e9053bc096~mv2.jpg"}}]}},"silent":false,"badges":[]}}'

 who is sending or receiving the message.

Whether the message is being sent from the visitor or the business.

 - `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`:

 - `VISITOR_TO_BUSINESS`:

 Defaults to `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`.

docs.summary:
Triggered when the business
 sends a message to a visitor, contact, or member.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a visitor, contact, or member
 sends a message to the business.

 You can use the provided visitor ID in `actionEvent.body.visitorId`
 to [send the visitor a message](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/send-message)
 or [list the visitor's messages](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/list-messages).

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

docs.summary:
Triggered when a postback button is clicked.

To create a postback button when
[sending a message](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/send-message),
use the `TEMPLATE` message payload type
and add a button with the `POSTBACK` button type.

permissions.name: Manage Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permissions to read and send chat messages on behalf of the site and visitors.

permissions.name: Read Inbox Messages
permissions.description: Request permission to read chat messages.

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToVisitorDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Visitor Domain Event Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.chat.v1.message`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `message_sent_to_visitor`.
Event name.

members.name: actionEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: MessageSentToVisitor ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToVisitorActionEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Visitor Action Event Object

members.name: body
members.doc: Event body

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToBusinessDomainEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Business Domain Event Object

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.chat.v1.message`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `message_sent_to_business`.
Event name.

members.name: actionEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: MessageSentToBusiness ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest

messages.name: _com_wixpress_chat_MessageSentToBusinessActionEvent
messages.displayName: Message Sent To Business Action Event Object

members.name: body
members.doc: Event body

members.name: id
members.doc: Unique event ID.

members.name: entityFqdn
members.doc:
Expected `wix.chat.v1.message`.
Fully Qualified Domain Name.

members.name: slug
members.doc:
Expected `button_interacted`.
Event name.

members.name: actionEvent
members.doc: Event Info

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ButtonInteracted ID associated with this event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether this event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (e.g., GDPR).

members.name: body
members.doc: Event body

members.name: url
members.doc:
URL to launch when an action button is clicked.

 Required when `type` is `ACTION`.

members.name: label
members.doc: Button label text.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Button type.

 - `ACTION`: Opens a webpage at the address specified in `url`.
 - `POSTBACK`: Sends the specified `buttonPayload` to the
   [Button Interacted Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/button-interacted-webhook).

 > **Note:**
 > `POSTBACK` buttons cannot be clicked from Inbox.

members.name: buttonPayload
members.doc:
Payload to send when a postback button is clicked.
 Included in `actionEvent.body.buttonPayload` when the
 [Button Interacted Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/button-interacted-webhook)
 is triggered.

 Required when `type` is `POSTBACK`.

members.name: appId
members.doc: [Your app's](https://dev.wix.com/dc3/my-apps) App ID.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: ID you define for the interaction, to be handled by your server.

members.name: appId
members.doc: [Your app's](https://dev.wix.com/dc3/my-apps) App ID.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: ID you define for the interaction, to be handled by your server.

members.name: sendingParticipant
members.doc:
ID of the message sender.
 This could belong to a visitor, contact, member, or site contributor.

members.name: limit
members.doc:
The number of items to load.
 Cursor token returned in the query response. To be used on the next query request, but not the first query request.

members.name: cursor
members.doc: Cursor returned in last query response. Should not be provided on first page request

members.name: fieldName
members.doc: Name of the field to sort by.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order.

 Defaults to `ASC`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Message ID.

members.name: payload
members.doc: Structured message data.

members.name: silent
members.doc:
Controls whether the unread count and conversation summary are updated in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

 If `true`, unread count and conversation summary are not updated.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: badges
members.doc:
Optional icon and short text that indicate an additional detail about the message,
 such as the service the message was sent from
 or whether the message was an automated response.

 Currently only the first badge is displayed in Inbox.
 Additional badges are available through the API.

members.name: visibility
members.doc:
Controls who can see the message.

 - `EVERYONE`: Visible to the visitor and site contributors.
 - `BUSINESS`: Visible to site contributors only.

 Defaults to `EVERYONE`.

members.name: isEphemeral
members.doc:
indicates if this message should upgrade a chatroom from temporary to permanent (when true it wont upgrade)

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: id
members.doc: Message ID.

members.name: participantId
members.doc:
ID of the message sender.
 This could belong to a visitor, contact, member, or site contributor.

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: Date and time the message was sent.

members.name: sequence
members.doc:
Indicates the sequential ordering of the message.
 Ensures more accurate sorting than `createdDate`
 if two messages are sent at the same time.

members.name: payload
members.doc: Structured message data.

members.name: silent
members.doc:
Controls whether the unread count and conversation summary are updated in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

 If `true`, unread count and conversation summary are not updated.

 Defaults to `false`.

members.name: badges
members.doc:
Optional icon and short text that indicate an additional detail about the message,
 such as the service the message was sent from
 or whether the message was an automated response.

 Currently only the first badge is displayed in Inbox.
 Additional badges are available through the API.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Type of message.

 - `PLAIN`: Plain text, file, or image message.
   Message content is structured in the `plain` object.
 - `TEMPLATE`: Template containing an image, title, text, and/or call-to-action buttons.
   Message content is structured in the `template` object.
 - `MINIMAL`: Single line of text and optional icon.
   Message content is structured in the `minimal` object.
 - `FORM`: Submitted form data.
   Message content is structured in the `form` object.
 - `CUSTOM`: For internal use.
   Message content is structured in the `custom` object.

members.name: summary
members.doc:
Summary of message contents.
 Displayed in Inbox in the
 [Message List](https://support.wix.com/en/article/wix-inbox-getting-started#view-your-messages).

members.name: payload
members.doc: different payload based on type

members.name: plain
members.doc:
Plain text, file, or image message.

 Used when `type` is `PLAIN`.

members.name: template
members.doc:
Contains an image, title, text, and/or up to 10 call-to-action buttons.

 Used when `type` is `TEMPLATE`.

members.name: minimal
members.doc:
Minimal message containing a single line of text
 and an optional icon.
 Often reports an activity that took place.

 Used when `type` is `MINIMAL`.

members.name: form
members.doc:
Message containing submitted form data.
 Typically sent with a `direction` of `VISITOR_TO_BUSINESS`
 and message `visibility` of `BUSINESS`.

 Used when `type` is `FORM`.

members.name: custom
members.doc:
Custom message, for internal use.

 Used when `type` is `CUSTOM`.

members.name: data
members.doc:
List of plain text messages, images, and/or files.
 List items are displayed as separate messages
 in Inbox and the site's chat widget.

members.name: type
members.doc:
Data type.

 Must accompany the corresponding `text`, `image`, or `file` property.

members.name: text
members.doc: Text message.

members.name: image
members.doc:
Image message.
 Can contain an image from Wix Media
 or from an external provider.

members.name: file
members.doc:
File attachment.
 Can contain a file from Wix Media or an external provider.

members.name: id
members.doc: Wix Media ID.

members.name: fileName
members.doc: File name of the original file.

members.name: fileSize
members.doc: File size, in bytes.

members.name: mimeType
members.doc: Image [MIME type](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types).

members.name: width
members.doc: Original image width, in pixels.

members.name: height
members.doc: Original image height, in pixels.

members.name: url
members.doc: URL where the image is hosted.

members.name: id
members.doc: Wix Media ID.

members.name: fileName
members.doc: File name of the original file.

members.name: fileSize
members.doc: File size, in bytes.

members.name: mimeType
members.doc: File [MIME type](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Basics_of_HTTP/MIME_types).

members.name: url
members.doc: URL where the image is hosted.

members.name: title
members.doc: Title displayed in the message.

members.name: buttons
members.doc:
List of buttons to display with the message.
 Buttons can either open a URL or pass interaction details to the
 [Button Interacted Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/button-interacted-webhook).

 Can contain a maximum of 10 buttons.

members.name: orientation
members.doc:
Controls whether the message is displayed in portrait or landscape layout.

 Defaults to `PORTRAIT`.

members.name: textLines
members.doc: List of lines of text. Each item in the array is displayed on a new line.

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: text
members.doc: Message text.

members.name: url
members.doc: If included, URL the user is redirected to when clicking the message.

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: title
members.doc: Form title displayed in the message.

members.name: description
members.doc: Form description displayed below the title.

members.name: fields
members.doc: List of form fields and values.

members.name: media
members.doc:
List of files and/or images attached to the form.

 List items are displayed as separate messages
 in Inbox and the site's chat widget.

members.name: type
members.doc: Message identifier. Example: `my-custom-message`.

members.name: data
members.doc: Message data in key:value pairs.

members.name: type
members.doc: the type of the message

members.name: data
members.doc: the payload of the message

members.name: name
members.doc: Form field display name.

members.name: value
members.doc: Submitted value.

members.name: image
members.doc:
Image message.
 Can contain an image from Wix Media
 or from an external provider.

members.name: file
members.doc:
File attachment.
 Can contain a file from Wix Media or an external provider.

members.name: text
members.doc: Text to display.

members.name: visibility
members.doc: Deprecated. Use `badgeVisibility` instead.

members.name: iconUrl
members.doc: URL where the icon is hosted.

members.name: badgeVisibility
members.doc:
Controls whether the badge is visible for visitors.
 Currently not supported in the chat widget.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
whose messages will be retrieved.

members.name: paging
members.doc:
Paging options.

To retrieve pages after the first page,
use the returned `nextCursor` value from each response
in the next request's `paging.cursor` parameter.

`paging.cursor` is not used in the first request.

members.name: order
members.doc:
Sort order. Messages are sorted by the `sequence` property.

 - `ASC`: Messages are sorted from earliest to most recent.
 - `DESC`: Messages are sorted from most recent to earliest.

 Defaults to `DESC`.

members.name: viewAs
members.doc:
Controls which message data is returned
based on message and badge visibility.

- `VISITOR`: Messages are returned where `visibility` is `EVERYONE`. In those messages, only badges where `badgeVisibility` is `EVERYONE` are returned.
- `BUSINESS`: All messages and badges are returned.

For 3rd-party apps, defaults to `VISITOR`.

members.name: messages
members.doc: List of messages between the specified visitor and the site.

members.name: nextCursor
members.doc:
Cursor for the next page of results.
 To retrieve the next page,
 pass this value in the `paging.cursor` query parameter
 of the next List Messages request.

 Omitted from the last page,
 indicating there are no more results.

members.name: visitor
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending or receiving the message.

members.name: message
members.doc: Message to send.

members.name: direction
members.doc:
Whether the message is being sent from the visitor or the business.

 - `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`:
   Message is displayed in Inbox and the chat widget as if the visitor sent it.
   Triggers the [Message Sent To Visitor Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/message-sent-to-visitor-webhook).
 - `VISITOR_TO_BUSINESS`:
   Message is displayed in Inbox and the chat widget as if the business sent it.
   Triggers the [Message Sent To Business Webhook](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/message-sent-to-business-webhook).

 Defaults to `BUSINESS_TO_VISITOR`.

members.name: notificationChannels
members.doc: Whether this message should trigger notifications or not

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending or receiving the message.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: id
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending or receiving the message.

members.name: id
members.doc: the id of the channel, e.g. FACEBOOK

members.name: values
members.doc: the identifier of the visitor in this channel, e.g. for FACEBOOK - his Facebook ID

members.name: sendRealTime
members.doc: Whether to send realtime of MessageSent

members.name: action
members.doc: Details of the chat action performed - currently only button interaction is supported

members.name: actionType
members.doc: Type of action. Currently only ButtonInteraction is supported.

members.name: appId
members.doc: AppId of the application that created the button.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: Unique ID of the given button's interaction.

members.name: buttonPayload
members.doc: Payload data provided in the button's `buttonPayload` property.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is receiving the message.

members.name: message
members.doc: Sent message.

members.name: visitorId
members.doc:
[ID of the visitor, contact, or member](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/all-apis/inbox/types-of-visitor-ids)
 who is sending the message.

members.name: interaction
members.doc: Will be sent if the message was sent as a result of a button interaction

members.name: appId
members.doc: [Your app's](https://dev.wix.com/dc3/my-apps) App ID.

members.name: interactionId
members.doc: ID you define for the interaction, to be handled by your server.
